TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION:
This lookup was added for ITPR002957 FEP 2012 for Rebates.
It is to be used to do claim level lookups during the claim extracts using the claim pharmacy network ID, and the assigned Rebate ID, to determine if it's using a Specialty Network. If the claim fields match the a row in the lookup, use the SPCL_DRUG_CD on the lookup for the target field value on BCA.
Changed to be an unconnected lookup for project ITPR000634.
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: LKP_RCIT_SPCL_NTWK

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Used for lookup to identify FEP specialty pharmacies in LKP_RCIT_SPCL_NTWK, matched to the RBAT_ID on BCI during claim extract.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: RBAT_ID

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Used for lookup to identify FEP specialty pharmacies in LKP_RCIT_SPCL_NTWK, matched to the RBAT_ID on BCI during claim extract.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: in_RBAT_ID

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Used for lookup to identify FEP specialty pharmacies in LKP_RCIT_SPCL_NTWK, matched to the claims RX/NABP Network ID during claim extract.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: PMCY_NTWK_ID

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Used for lookup to identify FEP specialty pharmacies in LKP_RCIT_SPCL_NTWK, matched to the claims RX/NABP Network ID during claim extract.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: in_PMCY_NTWK_ID

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Used for lookup to identify FEP specialty pharmacies in LKP_RCIT_SPCL_NTWK, compared to the DSPN_DT on BCI during claim extract.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: EFF_DT

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Used for lookup to identify FEP specialty pharmacies in LKP_RCIT_SPCL_NTWK, compared to the DSPN_DT on BCI during claim extract.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: TERM_DT

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: Used for lookup to identify FEP specialty pharmacies in LKP_RCIT_SPCL_NTWK, compared to the DSPN_DT on BCI during claim extract.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: in_DSPN_DT

TRANSFORMFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This value will be used to set the RCIT_BASE_CLM_APC.SPCL_DRUG_CD value when a claim matches the row in this table.
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: SPCL_DRUG_CD

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Lookup condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: RBAT_ID = in_RBAT_ID AND PMCY_NTWK_ID = in_PMCY_NTWK_ID AND EFF_DT <= in_DSPN_DT AND TERM_DT >= in_DSPN_DT
